name: Ninja Hood Jacket / SHDW Dyed
description:
New "Rippling Shadows" line by Shinobi.


Asymmetric zip sweater with anatomical fit and hood transforming into ninja mask. Two outer and two big inner pockets. Thumb holes in cuffs.


"Black Oxide" matte metal zippers are designed and made specially for our RS line by YKK with all custom elements.


Crafted from soft 100% cotton fabric. Ready garment dyed using Cold Dye technology. This dyeing method requires an individual approach to every item that makes it unique handmade piece of art. Number is limited.


Material:
Base: 100% Cotton, 250gr/m2
Lining: 100% Cotton

name: Scout Hoodie / DRT GRY Dye
description:
Single item sample for "Rippling Shadows" line by Shinobi.


Original model with unique S-shaped side seam allows for the best anatomical fit, retaining maximum comfort and lightness. The hood is constructed in such a way, that when it's down, it still keeps it's shape and protects your neck from the wind. Two big and comfortable pockets. Thumb holes in cuffs.


Crafted from soft 100% cotton fabric. Ready garment dyed using Cold Dye technology. This dyeing method requires an individual approach to every item that makes it unique handmade piece of art.


Material: Base: 100% Cotton, 250gr/m2 Lining: 100% Cotton
